headline: Parker Declares Quarterly Cash Dividend
summary: CLEVELAND, Jan. 22, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Parker Hannifin Corporation (NYSE: PH), the global leader in motion and control technologies, today announced that its Board of Directors has declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $1.80 per share of common stock to shareholders of record as of February 6, 2026.
